meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Scott Vinick Cara Harley Jason Shore Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6489.

td.p: Scott Vinick, an information technology consultant from Sagamore Hills, Ohio
Cara Harley, a medical writer from Charlestown, Massachusetts
Jason Shore, a medical student from Plano, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $22,878)

tr.td: WHERE AM I?
RANDOMONIUM
QUEEN ELIZABETH'S DIAMOND JUBILEE
GAME SHOW NAMES IN OTHER COUNTRIES
(Alex: That sounds like fun.)
ALL ABOUT ACTING
PICK UP YOUR "CUE"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Kelly of the Clue Crew presents the clue.) I\'m on this archipelago 600 miles west of Ecuador, whose isolation accounts for the uniqueness of the wildlife')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Kelly of the Clue Crew presents the clue.) I'm on this archipelago 600 miles west of Ecuador, whose isolation accounts for the uniqueness of the wildlife

Cara
Scott

ON THE BROADWAY DINER MENU

IT'S "OVER"!

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
